title: Ticket #4234: Can't condor_compile with icc
description: Based on some brief testing at LIGO, it looks like -static -B<dirname> will do the trick for compiling with icc. I'd like more-extensive testing before publicizing this as a "supported" compiler, though.

        fi
        echo "  where <command> is one of the following:"
        echo "  gcc, g++, g77, gfortran, cc, acc, c89, CC, f77, fort77, ld, "
-       echo "  pgcc, pgf77, pgf90, or pghpf."
+       echo "  pgcc, pgf77, pgf90, pghpf, or icc."
        echo "  (on some platforms, f90 is also allowed)"

+if [ $myname = "icc" ]; then

+fi
